publisher.publisher-name: American Association for the Advancement of Science

title-group.article-title: A Correction to the Research Article Titled: “The Identification and Characterization of Breast Cancer CTCs Competent for Brain Metastasis” by L. Zhang, L. D. Ridgway, M. D. Wetzel, J. Ngo, W. Yin, D. Kumar, J. C. Goodman, M. D. Groves, D. Marchetti

permissions.copyright-statement: Copyright © 2013, American Association for the Advancement of Science
permissions.copyright-holder: American Association for the Advancement of Science

body.p: Correction to Zhang et al., Sci Transl Med 5 (180) 180ra48

There was a labeling error in Fig. 3: The label for panel C was incorrect, and the label for panel D was missing. Also, the corresponding author e-mail in the Supplementary Materials was incorrect and should have been marchett@bcm.edu.

The corrected online version of the the full text is at http://stm.sciencemag.org/content/5/180/180ra48.full, the corrected PDF version of the article is at http://stm.sciencemag.org/content/5/180/180ra48.full.pdf, and the corrected supplementary material is at http://stm.sciencemag.org/content/5/180/180ra48/suppl/DC1.
